name: Game asset sticker 🐲dragon Hellguardian🌀 beyblade design
description:
I made this Hellguardian Dragon🐲 sticker as a part of a Beyblade Game that I am designing. Hellguardian is one of the main Beyblade characters in the game. It has got the highest level of damage with spikes and shields as powerups.


  • From now on I will be posting my game design work for free in Figma Community and also at Gumroad(with new updates & versions).
  • 👉https://srikantdesign.gumroad.com/hellguardian_dragon_beyblade_sticker


If you are interested to donate a few bucks I would highly appreciate it😇 as it motivates me to open-source more designs and game assets for you😀.


  • This is completely made in Figma😉. Sneak peek the game on Playstore to see more designs (Bladers: Online Multiplayer Spinning Tops)


  • At this time of posting it is having 510,000+ installs on Playstore. Will soon be launching to iOS.


  • Any feedback or suggestions is highly appreciated😁
